Know the weather and get recommendations: Know the weather and get recommendations as easily as talking to a friend.
Recommendation about the type of crops t: Recommendation about the type of crops to be cultivated which is best suited for the respective conditions
Recommendation about the type of fertili: Recommendation about the type of fertilizer best suited for the particular soil and the recommended crop
Predicting the name and causes of the cr: Predicting the name and causes of the crop disease and suggestions to cure it
Various youtube links to useful advice i: Various youtube links to useful advice in multiple languages
title: Fertilizer Predictor

list.name: Rajkumari Devi (Kisan Chachi)
list.story: Known for her work in organic farming and empowering women through self-help groups in Bihar.

list.name: Babulal Dahiya
list.story: An organic farmer from Madhya Pradesh who grows over 200 traditional varieties of rice and is also a renowned poet.

list.name: Vallabhbhai Vasrambhai Marvaniya
list.story: A 97-year-old farmer from Gujarat who introduced carrots to local diets and developed high-yielding varieties.

list.name: Kanwal Singh Chauhan
list.story: A farmer from Haryana who successfully cultivates baby corn and has helped over 5,000 farmers improve their yields.

list.name: Kamala Pujhari
list.story: A tribal agricultural activist from Odisha known for preserving traditional paddy varieties and promoting organic farming.

list.name: Jagdish Prasad Parikh
list.story: A farmer from Rajasthan who holds a record for growing one of the largest cauliflowers in the world.

list.name: Hukumchand Patidar
list.story: An organic farmer from Rajasthan who transformed his farm into a model for organic practices and exports produce internationally.

list.name: Bharat Bhushan Tyagi
list.story: A science graduate who returned to his village in Uttar Pradesh to promote organic farming and educate over 100,000 farmers.

list.name: Ram Saran Verma
list.story: Known as UP's "hi-tech farmer," he introduced tissue culture for banana farming and significantly increased his family's income.

list.name: Subhash Palekar
list.story: A pioneer of natural farming in India, he developed the Zero Budget Natural Farming method to reduce costs and improve yields.
